title: Rafah Crossing in Gaza Reopens, Another Step for Fragile Cease-Fire
summary_full: Israel and Egypt had disagreed for months about how to resume operations at the Rafah border crossing, which has been closed for nearly a year.
summary_public: Israel and Egypt had disagreed for months about how to resume operations at the Rafah border crossing, which has been closed for nearly a year.
